sentence: More:GOP censures Reps. Liz Cheney and Adam Kinzinger, calls Jan. 6 riot 'legitimate political discourse' With the Senate deadlocked 50-50 between the parties and controlled by the Democrats because of Vice President Kamala Harris' tie-breaking vote the Republicans face toss-up Senate elections in places like Pennsylvania, Georgia and Arizona, states that Biden carried.
author: David Jackson
title: Mitch McConnell calls Jan. 6 a 'violent insurrection,' hits Republicans for censure of Cheney, Kinzinger
